review: Amazing app! Very smooth and beautiful designs. There are some bugs though.. 1. On Snapchat, it shows the default volume slider. 2. Volume styles appear even on the always on display (Samsung). 3. While taking screenshots, the volume panel is visible. 4. Not a bug, but while using wireless earbuds, Bluetooth icon would be better while increasing or decreasing the volume. Please look into these issues!

It's the best one I've seen so far. But there is one issue, I kept my phone to restart every morning so that it performs good for the rest of the day, after the restart, the app doesn't work. When I press the volume keys, the normal in build phone's volume UI comes in play, not the app's one. So is it because of my phone's restart or anything else with the app?

Yea I like the app especially for Android 9(pie) which does not show other volume settings. But a few things needed to be fixed. 1. While cancelling the sound (the crossed bell icon), it directly goes to DND mode. 2. While taking screenshot volume bar is appearing. 3. For taking pictures volume button does not work. I would be appreciated if you look after the flaws üòä.

This app is good. The only problem I happened to encounter is, when i try to increase or decrease the volume by touching the volume rocker and sliding it up or down, the actual volume remains the same, but the volume panel shows that the volume has been increased/decreased. The volume can only be changed by using the volume buttons. I have downloaded this app on realme 6.

The app is awesome but have an issue. App is amazing with so many different styles. It can change the personality of your app. issue I've found with the app is the position of it in Landscape Mode. The app let you adjust the position of sliders but it often cut out in the landscape mode. Because the app doesn't let you adjust position for different orientation. In order to get the full volume bar for landscape, need to raise its position. Which will affect your exp in portrait mod

Best skins to choose from. Does what it claims to do. Works beautifully. Number of skins and customizations provided in Volume Styles for free is much more than those provided by other such apps even after you pay for them. Best volume styler app out there!! EDIT : After updating my phone to Android 11, on landscape mode, the volume slider is only half visible. This wasn't the case when my device was running on Android 10. I request the developer to kindly fix this soon.

It customizes your volume bars as it is mentioned. This app do the work as it described. I'm happy with the application however there is a only one problem sometimes the volume stuck half like 50% only while playing songs and watching YouTube through earphones. I thought it might be a glitch however it usually happens. I have to switch to the stock volume bars in order to increase the volume.

After the recent update for some reason the app keeps on telling me to turn on accessibility from settings, which I've already turned on, and refuses to start. Reinstalling the app fixes it temporarily, as the issue again pops up after a couple of days. Made me uninstall the app which I've been using for such a long time. Please fix it.

Everything is good and stunning ideas but it is hard to access this feature. When phone's ram is cleared it automatically off this feature even I set all accessibility turn on even power management set as off and locked ram management too. Once it is gone it is hard to activate this feature again as the accessibility are already on and app system seems like do not recognise the accessibility again. Even trying on off again again it does not work. Please get in touched with this issue. Thanks.

I could give this app a 5...but for some reason volume sliders doesn't feel completely like built-in type. For instance...volume slider is triggered after taking a screenshot. Though it's not captured in that shot...it still feels odd( which is not the case in built in volume slider ) . Is there any way you could fix this?? Otherwise this app is cool!!

The App is good. Bit there are bugs aswell which needs to be fixed a) The positioning of the volume panel is erratic for different community styles. The change of position via swipe to open does not get applied even if the provision to apply exists. Suppose I want to keep in the lower bottom corner does not work. b) Shortcuts that appear in the volume slider except for the settings dont work. They just vibrate when the option to vibrate is enabled. c) The sort of vol typ is not working .

My phone manufacturer didn't support my phone model with an android 10 update, so I had to resort to downloading apps to see the features I wanted. This app makes the volume bar much more accessible and the design is very neat. I also love having the option to manage screen brightness from the sliders.

The app does not work if cleared from recents even once, it only worked once when i downloaded it and it is asking to turn the accessibility toggle on even though its on. And when i try disable and then enable it, it still asks me to turn that on. Everytime I have to use the app I have to clear the data and reconfigure the permissions. it's just so annoying.

Really awesome app. It has preloaded styles and we can also customize it ourselves with icon styles, thickness, length, design. So many choices!! That also with so much less MBs. Only 4MB and thats very fine. It would be nice if you can make the color option free and increase the app MB in its place. Overall its a wonderful app. Keep it up!

Working like a charm!!! Amazing app. Smoothly running in portrait and landscape mode even while watching videos in third party apps. Wonderful! I can't believe the customise option is amazing. It allows you to modify the volume control in your way. Wonderful job üëåüèª

Love the app, when it doesn't crash. I'd rate it 5 stars otherwise, since I definitely triple checked that I have battery optimization disabled. Sometimes the app will go a week without crashing, other times once a day. Another annoying thing is having to uncheck and recheck the permissions settings after the app crashes, since it seems to think I turned it off.

Excellent app, allowed me to fix the biggest issues with the Google Pixel. I just wish it had volume control overrides for the volume buttons on the Pixel series so I could control ringer when no app is open and media when something is open. This issue has also been posted on the feature request page. Overall great app! Love it! Keep it up!

Great app. I highly recommend it if you are dissatisfied with your phone's default volume controls. However, sometimes it gets stuck at the top of the screen, or the accessibility service might stop working, which means you have to go to Accessibility settings and turn it off and on again. It's still worth it, though, and it's well polished, with lots of features.

This app kept shutting down by an Android 12 battery optimization error every few days and I had to manually restart it under accessibility settings. And the problem is, it doesn't show up in the menu that allows you to add it to never sleeping apps. Shame, because otherwise I like it. Went with Volume Panel Pro for 99 cents which is just as good as this app but doesn't have that problem.

I bought the pro version because of the amaIng features this program have, but there are two main problems that made the programe the worst : firstly, i couldn't change the volume style or edit anything from the app , i deleted it several times and installed it again and the problem still not solved...secondly, the battery optimisation always returns the clasic style of the phone and u got to open accessibility to return the volume style.

EDIT: dropping my review to one star due to having to constantly go in and turn the accessibility option off and back on to get it working again, sometimes multiple times an hour, other times it keeps working for a week or two. I've done everything I've been told to do by the don't kill my app pop up & in the FAQ. This has gotten much worse in Android 12. It seems there are workarounds for this for other apps that I have seen that are working great, this developer should look into them

Serious bug that makes it unusable. I have a Galaxy S20. When you slide the "ringtone" and "system" to zero it silences alarm sound. Even though "alarm" has it's own slider and it's at maximum. I've tested this thoroughly and when I just slide the ringtone silent my alarms don't work even with alarm slider maxed out. That's terrible.

Very nice. One thing that is a half issue is that the slider doesn't register the exact position of my finger when adjusting the volume. I touch the slider in the center and the volume adjusts to a little below where I'm touching. Otherwise fantastic app.

It looks awesome and the different styles are great, but it doesn't actually use them anymore after 10 minutes of using the app. The accessibility features are always crashed, and it is blaming the whole thing on battery optimization (which I disabled).

This widget saved me, no more volume problems and it looks better than the system volume controls! ----------------Before; the hardware volume switch on my cheap tablet is was really hokey. It would reverse directions of volume with the controls and stutter all the time.

Works seamlessly on miui. Love all the customization options and you don't even need to buy the pro version. For people who don't want the app to stop working if you close it in Recents, go to apps>system app settings>security settings>boost speed and lock the app.

So I downloaded and bought premium about 6 months ago and it's been working fine apart the occasional time I had to re enable it but recently it's stopped working all together üò•ü§∑. Iv uninstall and reinstalled and it's done nothing, reset my phone and it works once then doesn't work anymore after that. Shame as I really like the app and the style I made, it looked nice with my home screen, looks so much better then basic phone volume it's boring.

Purchased this app. No regret. Except minor bug that the slider doesn't change the volume until I enable option "play sound when changing volume" in realme devices. Also not all styles support the add shortcut feature. Will be perfect if we're allowed to add shortcuts for every styles. Great app anyway

It does what it say, gives you access to different volume styles icons. It also give a pretty more than basic access to volume configuration. You have to pin the app to background, otherwise it will be killed by memory optimisation app. Totally recommend.

This is really good but it would be nice if you didn't have to have a main volume slider. Like on that menu where you can pick which sliders you want all the time I would like if you could have nothing there so you just get the slider you need and not the little arrow at the bottom

Excellent customizer app! Works great overall. But sometimes the sound mode-shortcut can't turn my phone to vibrate mode. I rarely use it, but c'mon.. this small problem should be fixed in this near-perfect app!

Works super well, has a LOT of customization options while still looking and working well. Many of these system UI replacement apps have some jank due limitations of Android but this one is very smooth.

This app is is okay except for one major flaw, after a day or so it keeps resorting and automatically changing back to regular volume mode and disregards this app. I have to keep going back into my settings and allow the app to work. It's tedious and not worth it. Sad to say I should have read the reviews instead of paying for the no ad pro version. I would give it no stars if I could. Lesson learned.

Beautiful app!!! Works flawless and fully customizable allows you to place volume control on screen where you want it, in my case on the middle far right where volume switch is located allowing my thumb to toggle ringer/mute/vibrate etc.. Currently using Apple style skin. Love it!

Best and only app for changing your volume slider. But if there was an option for changing the accent color with just watching an ad, I would give it a 5 star. The other problem is whenever u switch to landscape mode somethings the slider isn't fully visible hope you fix that too.

Really like the swipe gesture so I dont need to push the buttons. The only thing is, every few days the app would randomly stop working and require a forced restart, even though battery optimation is turned off.

Worked great, animations for coming in and out just stopped working and when I was trying to troubleshoot it, the animations were broken in the tab for changing it too. Had to delete it. Uninstalling and reinstalling didn't work, I don't know what made it happen either.

The reason I'm 4 is because a year ago I was able to change the color of the sliders and also use gradients. Now I reinstalled the app and I found out that I can't change the color unless I get premium. I would really like to see this change, at least for the color part, and if it's not possible make it a free option after an ad. I will keep on using the app but, I would really like to this come back.

Happy to get my ringer back as the default volume button control but the app is a little quirky. [Edit: reinstalled, made sure no battery optimization was on for this app and haven't had any problems for months. 5 stars.]
This app is fantastic. If you added Sound Assistant support for Samsung users and a button to toggle mono audio on and off, it would be perfect.
